name: food-order-s_v0.1
description: **DEVELOPMENT PHASE**   * Home Page - Done   * Food Page - Done   * Login Page - Done   * Register Page - Done   * Backend - Done   * Database (MongoDB) - Done   * Cart Page - Done   * Checkout Page - Done   * Maps Integration - Done   * Dashboard (Admin or Not) - **Developing**   * Orders Page - **Developing**   * Payment (Razorpay ) - Done   * Profile Page - Done

scripts.start:both: concurrently "npm run start" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.prebuild: npm run install-backend && npm run install-client
scripts.postbuild: npm run remove_build && mv -f client/dist api/src/public/
